metadata.key_specifications: Zener voltage regulator diode in SC-70 package, total power dissipation: 360mW (max), low I/O capacitance: 80pF (max), low leakage current: 0.6μA (max), tolerance: ±5%, temperature range: -55°C to +150°C

page_summaries.content:
BZX84WCx Zener Voltage Regulator Diode in SC-70
1 Features
• Total power dissipation: 360mW (max)
• Low I/O capacitance: 80pF (max)
• Low leakage current: 0.6μA (max)
• Tolerance: ±5%
• Temperature range: -55°C to +150°C
• Leaded package used for automatic optical inspection (AOI)
2 Applications
• Voltage regulation
• Over-voltage protection
3 Description
The BZX84WCx is a family of voltage regulating diodes in a SC-70 package. The diodes are available in Zener voltages ranging from 8.2V to 39V.

4 Device Comparison Table

Product Summary.content: The BZX84WCx is a family of voltage regulating diodes in a SC-70 package. It is a Zener voltage regulator diode with key features including total power dissipation of 360mW (max), low I/O capacitance of 80pF (max), low leakage current of 0.6μA (max), voltage tolerance of ±5%, and a temperature range of -55°C to +150°C.

The BZX84WCx Zener voltage regulator diode is designed for applications such as voltage regulation and over-voltage protection. It is available in a leaded SC-70 package suitable for automatic optical inspection (AOI).
The BZX84WCx Zener diode family offers a range of Zener voltages from 8.2V to 39V, providing voltage regulation capabilities for various electronic circuits and systems.

Mechanical Characteristics.content: 4 Device Comparison Table: ZENER FAMILY POWER DISSIPATION PACKAGE - BZX84Cx / BZX84Cx-Q1 250mW SOT-23, BZX84WCx / BZX84WCx-Q1 360mW SC-70, SZMM3Zx (1) / SZMM3Zx-Q1 (1) 300mW SOD323, SZMM5Zx (1) / SZMM5Zx-Q1 (1) 290mW SOD523. This table provides information about different Zener diode families, their power dissipation ratings, and package types.

6.1 Absolute Maximum Ratings: PD (2) (3) Total Power Dissipation 360 mW, IF Forward Current 200 mA, TA Ambient Operating Temperature -55 to 150 °C, Tstg Storage Temperature -65 to 155 °C. This section outlines the absolute maximum ratings for various parameters, including power dissipation, forward current, operating temperature range, and storage temperature range.

6.2 Recommended Operating Conditions: VF Forward Voltage IF = 10mA 0.9 V, TA Operating free-air temperature -55 to 150 °C. This section provides recommended operating conditions for the forward voltage at a specific forward current and the operating temperature range.
